Asks too many rhetorical questions: 问了太多的反问句式的问题
Vitiligo-like skin patterning: 白癜风样的皮肤模式化
Smells like alcohol and/or other illicit: 闻起来像酒精和/或其他非法物质
Invades personal space too often: 太过频繁地侵犯个人空间
Is always intimidatingly sharpening a kn: 总是在令人生畏地磨刀。
Carves animal figurines for children: 为儿童雕刻动物小雕像
Overly blunt to the point of offense: 过于直率，以至于让人反感
Sneezes whenever someone says their name: 只要有人说起他们的名字就会打喷嚏
Obsessively organizing things in front o: 执着地在他们面前整理东西
Compulsion to sketch everyone they first: 强迫性地给他们第一次见到的每个人画素描
Psychoanalyzes everyone they meet: 对他们遇到的每个人进行心理分析
Zones out or daydreams often: 经常打瞌睡或做白日梦
Introduces self by a different name ever: 每次见到他们都用不同的名字介绍自己
Always speaks in hypotheticals: 总是用假设的方式说话
Constantly disappears when you turn away: 当你转身离开的时候，不断地消失。
Only uses magic for incredibly mundane t: 只在令人难以置信的平凡任务中使用魔法
Has an extremely archaic vocabulary: 有一个极其古老的词汇
Quotes religious texts incessantly or ex: 不停地引用宗教经文或专门引用宗教经文
Vain and cares about their appearance to: 虚荣心强，太在乎自己的外表
Unhygienic or unnaturally dirty: 不卫生或不自然的肮脏
Is a nosey and/or a gossip: 是个爱管闲事的人和/或八卦的人
Falsely claims they are/were an adventur: 谎称自己也是/曾经是个冒险家
Is overtly formal despite potential fami: 尽管有潜在的熟悉感，但明显是正式的
Uses some sort of signature phrase: 使用某种标志性的短语
Experiences chronic pain of some sort: 有某种慢性疼痛的经历
Has a terminal disease/disorder that wil: 患有绝症/障碍，只要有时间就一定会死。
